general_info.summary: This text lists several individuals, primarily referred to as "Dr.", who appear to hold academic or administrative positions. Dr. Pramod Kumar Singh is highlighted with multiple roles including Professor, Head of Department, Dean Academic Affairs, Associate Dean Research, and PhD. Cell head. The other individuals mentioned are Dr. Krishna Kumar Pandey, Dr. Pankaj Kumar Tripathi, and Dr. Har Mohan Singh.
